text: Angelyne (born Ronia Tamar Goldberg, October 2, 1950) is a Polish-born American singer, actress, personality, and model. She is known for being in many billboards in and around Los Angeles, California that read only "Angelyne". In 1982 she released her self-titled debut album. Another album, Driven to Fantasy was released in 1986. Angelyne then appeared in small parts in movies such as Earth Girls Are Easy (1988), Dangerous Love (1988), and Homer and Eddie (1989). In 2003, Angelyne became a candidate for Governor of California in the 2003 recall election.Pool, Bob (June 20, 2007). "Angelyne seeks enhanced deal". Los Angeles Times. Retrieved September 23, 2014. She began painting in 1998 and has had several art shows in Los Angeles.Kreuzer, Nikki (April 9, 2013). "Angelyne- Pretty in Pink", The Los Angeles Beat. title: Angelyne
